podman_systemd.container-node-exporter:
# container-node-exporter.service
# autogenerated by Podman 5.4.0
# Wed Dec 31 17:28:01 EET 2025

[Unit]
Description=Podman container-node-exporter.service
Documentation=man:podman-generate-systemd(1)
Wants=network-online.target
After=network-online.target
RequiresMountsFor=/run/containers/storage

[Service]
Environment=PODMAN_SYSTEMD_UNIT=%n
Restart=on-failure
TimeoutStopSec=70
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman start node-exporter
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop  \
	-t 10 node-exporter
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman stop  \
	-t 10 node-exporter
PIDFile=/run/containers/storage/overlay-containers/73e39ff1ad1b21d2e56fed28600ae81c119627852f1ba8e1dc6b17a2e291c13d/userdata/conmon.pid
Type=forking

[Install]
WantedBy=default.target
